请确认账单资料后付款。如对此账单有疑问, 请致电煤气公司24小时客户服务热线28: Review and confirm bill information before payment. For bill enquiry, please call the Towngas 24-hour Customer Service Hotline 2880 6988 for assistance.

开启后，微信公众号为你推送账单和账单超时提醒。: If enabled, you'll receive notifications when a new bill is available.

微信公众号将在账单日自动为你推送缴费提醒: Weixin Official Account will automatically send you payment notification messages on the billing day.

确定要关闭通知吗？关闭后账单生成或账单超时，微信公众号均不再给你推送提醒。: Are you sure you want to disable the reminder? If disabled, you won't receive notifications for new bills.
